mapper.select: select goods_name as goodsName, isbn as isbn, goods_introduce as goodsIntroduce, goods_price as goodsPrice, goods_image_path as goodsImagePath, goods_evaluate_score as goodsEvaluateScore, goods_author as goodsAuthor , goods_publish as goodsPublish from t_sys_goods where is_delete = 0 and goods_code = #{goodsCode} order by create_time

select a.user_account as userAccount, b.goods_evaluate_content as goodsEvaluateContent, b.goods_evaluate_score as goodsEvaluateScore, b.goods_evaluate_time as goodsEvaluateTime, b.goods_evaluate_code as goodsEvaluateCode from t_sys_user a, t_sys_goods_evaluate b where b.goods_code = #{goodsCode} and b.goods_evaluate_user = a.user_code order by b.create_time

select b.goods_evaluate_code as goodsEvaluateCode, b.goods_evaluate_image as goodsEvaluateImage from t_sys_goods_evaluate a, t_sys_goods_evaluate_image b where a.is_delete = 0 and a.goods_evaluate_code = b.goods_evaluate_code order by b.image_sort_num

select goods_cate_code as goodsCateCode, goods_cate_name as goodsCateName, version as version, cate_parent_code as cateParentCode from t_sys_goods_cate where is_delete = 0 and cate_parent_code = 0 order by create_time

select goods_cate_code as goodsCateCode, goods_cate_name as goodsCateName, version as version, cate_parent_code as cateParentCode from t_sys_goods_cate where is_delete = 0 and cate_parent_code != 0 and cate_parent_code = #{goodsCateCode} order by create_time

select goods_code as goodsCode, goods_name as goodsName, second_cate_code as secondCateCode, goods_image_path as goodsImagePath, goods_price as goodsPrice from t_sys_goods where is_delete = 0 order by create_time
